title: U.S. Unemployment Rescue Left Millions Without Help
itunes:title: U.S. Unemployment Rescue Left Millions Without Help
description:
Janet Elkin, CEO at ICON Medical Network, discusses the impact the pandemic has had on demand for physicians across the U.S. Bloomberg News Senior Tax Reporter Allyson Versprille explains that the Biden administration is targeting two provisions that wealthy Americans use to avoid taxes. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Senior Economics Writer Shawn Donnan talk about Shawn's Businessweek Magazine story Who Qualifies for Unemployment? Millions in U.S. Didn't Get Any. And we Drive to the Close with Tom Plumb, President and CIO at Plumb Funds. 

Hosts: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
